examples.example: 每天开机后，我都充满期待地开始新一天的工作。

translate.english: Every day after turning on the computer, I start the work of the new day with full expectation.

examples.example: 我每天开机的那一刻，都感觉自己充满了活力，能迎接新的挑战。

translate.english: Every time I turn on the computer at the moment, I feel full of energy and able to meet new challenges.

examples.example: 每次开机的时候，我都信心满满地准备去创造更美好的未来。

translate.english: Every time when I start the machine, I am full of confidence and ready to create a better future.
